title: 为什么我用整合包登陆正版账户打开物品栏时崩溃了
author: hagb
txt_content:
为什么我用1.5.2整合包登陆正版账户打开物品栏时崩溃了，皮肤可以用第三人称视角看到
整合包地址：整合包地址
崩溃信息：

      Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Exception in world tick

A full error report has been saved to D:\1.5.1\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-07-11_15.27.25-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(
